abstract.para: This file contains some basic information about MeshCMS. For a more detailed description and guide, open the userguide/index.html file.

section.title: Installing MeshCMS
section.para: Deploy meshcms.war to your application server. This gives you a fresh web application containing the basic elements, a home page and some sample themes.

section.title: Using MeshCMS
section.para: Open your new web application (usually http://localhost:8080/meshcms/). You can login using username "admin" and password "admin".

section.title: Credits
section.para: MeshCMS uses free software from other companies/developers:

listitem.para:
SiteMesh
these components are included unmodified, so you can upgrade them manually if you want to

Tigra Menu & Tigra Tree Menu
this component is not included in the MeshCMS release, but there is a custom tag that allows you to create a JavaScript menu easily with this script. Connect to its homepage to download it for use with MeshCMS
